description: Out in the sunlit garden we catch up with Pierre, a Canadian nomad who has finally settled in California. Sporting a body chiseled like a masterful work of art, this painter turned go-go dancer is sure to get you moving. As he reclines on a bench in front of a bay window, his muscles ripped and cut, his eyes full of lust and wonder, he unleashes is hard cock and lets it fall into his hand, smacking his palm with its weighty girth, before sitting down and stroking it to full length. Once hard, he hops onto his feet, squeezing his ass in the silouette of the afternoon sun, before laying back down and squeezing out his load all over his stomach, closing his eyes to appreciate the moment to the fullest.Enjoy!
title: Pierre
